resetAsset.command:
from python.lib import pose
reload(pose)
pose.resetAsset()

bipedArmGoToTPose.command:
from python.lib import pose
reload(pose)
pose.bipedArmGoToTPose()

bipedArmGoToTPoseSelected.command:
import maya.cmds as mc
from python.lib import pose
reload(pose)
pose.bipedArmGoToTPose(mc.ls(sl=True)[0])

bipedArmGoToAPose.command:
from python.lib import pose
reload(pose)
pose.bipedArmGoToAPose()

bipedArmGoToAPoseSelected.command:
import maya.cmds as mc
from python.lib import pose
reload(pose)
pose.bipedArmGoToAPose(mc.ls(sl=True)[0])

resetTransforms.command:
import maya.cmds as mc
from python.lib import trsLib
reload(trsLib)
[trsLib.resetTRS(x) for x in mc.ls(sl=1)]

match.command:
import maya.cmds as mc
from python.lib import trsLib
reload(trsLib)
trsLib.match(*mc.ls(sl=True))

mirrorLikeJnt.command:
from python.lib import trsLib
reload(trsLib)
trsLib.mirrorLikeJnt()

createOffsetGroup.command:
from python.lib import trsLib
reload(trsLib)
trsLib.insert(mode='allChilds', search='_GRP', replace='_OFS')

lock.command:
import maya.cmds as mc
from python.lib import attrLib
reload(attrLib)
for node in mc.ls(sl=1):
	attrLib.lockHideAttrs(node=node, attrs=['t', 'r', 's', 'v'], lock=True, hide=True)

unlock.command:
import maya.cmds as mc
from python.lib import attrLib
reload(attrLib)
for node in mc.ls(sl=1):
	attrLib.unlock(nodes=node, attrs=['t', 'r', 's', 'v'])

MirrorSkinCluster.command:
from python.lib import deformer
reload(deformer)
deformer.mirrorSkin(useSelection=True)

CopySkinCluster.command:
from python.lib import deformer
reload(deformer)
deformer.copySkin(useSelection=True)

ExportSkinCluster.command:
from python.lib import skincluster
reload(skincluster)
skincluster.exportSkinToDesktop()

ImportSkinCluster.command:
from python.lib import skincluster
reload(skincluster)
skincluster.importSkinToDesktop()

OrientUsingAim.command:
import maya.cmds as mc
from python.lib import jntLib
reload(jntLib)
sels=mc.ls(sl=1)
jntLib.orientUsingAim(jnts=sels[:-1] , upAim=sels[-1], aimAxes='x')

RemoveContainers.command:
from python.lib import container
reload(container)
container.removeAll()
